      public boolean isOnACoin()
      Returns:
      true if the robot is standing on a coin/if at least one coin is at the same position as the robot's position

    • isNextToACoin

      @Deprecated(since="0.3.0") public boolean isNextToACoin()
      Deprecated.
      Confusing name, use isOnACoin() instead.
      Returns:
      true if the robot is standing on a coin/if at least one coin is at the same position as the robot's position

    • isOnAnotherRobot

      public boolean isOnAnotherRobot()
      Returns:
